claim: Outbound escalation (PagerDuty/Telemetry allow_network=true) is deterministically gated behind config-based live safety flags and confirm token; default config blocks network escalation.
notes: Gate is enforced before urllib.request.urlopen() in PagerDuty provider. Default allow_network=false remains safe. When allow_network=true, config must satisfy enable_live_trading=true, live_mode_armed=true and confirm_token==LIVE_CONFIRM_TOKEN (if require_confirm_token=true).
